reviews.review: Vanilla's ok, but you can get thousands of hours out of the modded/community game-modes (Zombie Escape, Gun Game, Jailbreak etc). Unlike in CSGO, in CSS you only play on private community servers; not only are these better moderated than CSGO (hackers/trolls are banned swiftly by the admins) you actually make friends and have a much better and more social time on CSS. It's much more fun being autistic on Zombie Escape with your friends than raging because of hackers on CSGO competitive.

Gente que puedo decir es un juego de valve <3

Among all CS, this is my favorite one. It looks like it has everything for a great game: nice gameplay, pretty map design and having pretty graphics too, although it came out in 2004. If you're tired of CS:GO or CS 1.6, play it, maybe it will give you some new experiences.

- Tons of fun custom maps and mods that people actually play
- Ragdoll physics
- Free sprays (which are customizable)
- Not Free2Play
- No loot crates
- No BR mode

A great old game that is as good as they come. Still relevant even 16 + years after it was released. PC's that are running older technology can still easily play CS:S. Upgrades of the same hw make it even better.
The best game you will ever play

Been playing mainly CSGO for the past 6 years, and now that game has officially went to shit, cs1.6 and css suddenly interest me once again after almost a decade long break. Great game, much recommended over FortniteGO.

this game is better than Global Offensive for multiple reasons:
- no microtransactions
- more modder friendly
-barely anyone cheats
- the guns aren't broken
- no ranks and no differences in recoil from your ranks
- can run on lower tier PCs
- the older Source engine

Amazing game overall, a very unique and fun FPS experience. 
But they still haven't fixed the graphical bug that makes looking at hostages completely block out your screen for the Mac OS.
This pretty much destroys any chance to play hostage maps for this game or any map that uses a hostage model.
It's also been like this for a good 3-4 years and there's been a lot of complaints but no action.

edit1: Big anti-cheat problem also. If there's no admin, the lobby is dead and the cheater runs rampant. About half of my games gets ruined by a cheater.
